title: Cant Save .exe using reflixil and Red Gate Reflector 10.3
content: First off all im pretty new to Reverse Engineering. Im Stuck on Saving my Project. When i want to save the Assembly as .exe file Reflexil says cant save, the specified Method is not supported. I tried it even with the untouched original File, and it gets me the same Error. Pls help im kinda stuck.

answers_data.content:
Yep! Been there. It was VERY VERY picky about the order that you did things in, but then I found dnSpy. (FOSS), grab it, use it, and never look back.

dnSpy github page
There is also dotPeek Decompiler - works great https://www.jetbrains.com/decompiler/
